title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 801.0 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 801.0 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part implements Labor Law, section 27-a, subdivision
9, which provides for recordkeeping and reporting by public employers as
necessary or appropriate for enforcement of Labor Law, section 27-a, for
developing information regarding the causes and prevention of occupational
injuries and illnesses, and for making public periodic reports of work-related
deaths, injuries and illnesses. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
801.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
